vmassol joined #xwiki at 13:33  
skunx joined #xwiki at 13:36  
skunx - (29/07/2009 13:37): Hi folks, I installed a xem on my linux server, but the url works only with the ip address, not with the server name.. any hints?  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 13:47): Hi skunx  
alexmaru joined #xwiki at 13:47  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 13:48): Yes, you need to configure the supported server names for your wiki  
skunx - (29/07/2009 13:58): sdumitriu: how should I do this?   
sylverstorm joined #xwiki at 14:06  
sylverstorm - (29/07/2009 14:09): y a-t-il des français ici ?  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:09): sylverstorm: Yes, but we prefer english on the public channel  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:11): I couldn't find it on the doc   
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:13): skunx: Do you see something on /xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiServerXwiki ?  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:13): nop, redirects me to ThisWikiDoesNotExist  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:15): OK, I haven't used XEM that much, so there might be an easier way  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:15): But here's what you should do:  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:15): Open /xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/XWikiServerXwiki?editor=object  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:15): Add an object of type XWiki.XWikiServerClass  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:17): ok, i'll try this  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:17): thanx  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:17): For the Server field, use the domain name  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:18): Like intranet.mycompany.net  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:21): By the way, did you import the XEM application? http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Download#HXWikiEnterpriseManager  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:21): xwiki-enterprise-manager-wiki-administrator-1.7.1.xar or xwiki-enterprise-manager-application-xem-1.7.1.xar  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:21): yes I did  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:21): and configuring the XWikiServerClass worked out perfectly  
skunx - (29/07/2009 14:21): thank you   
sylverstorm - (29/07/2009 14:22): very much ;)  
sdumitriu - (29/07/2009 14:22): You're welcome  
skunx left at 14:22 ("down the road")  
sylverstorm left at 14:26 ()
